summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of South Webster Street from 3rd Avenue South to 5th Avenue South and certain other streets and avenues by asphaltic paving; Local Improvement District No. 6689, and appropriating additional money from the Arterial City Street Fund in aid thereof, said improvement being a part of Capital Improvement Program Project No. 13-0247, "Critical Street Paving" as Aid in Lieu of stabilizing and sealcoating.
